{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$3.6M in 2021-2022 on contracts with THINK ON.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [Think On Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Think%20On%20Inc.%22)
- [THINK ON INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22THINK%20ON%20INC.%22)
- [THINK ON, INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22THINK%20ON%2c%20INC.%22)
- [THINK ON. INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22THINK%20ON.%20INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
